TopicTitle: Show excess Liquid Fuel or Oxydizer at a glance

Articles.Content:
Hi.

 

Sometime we have excess (Or Shortage) Liquid Fuel vs the Oxidizer in say a space plane.

Could we have a small line in said resource to show the excess at a glance.

Akin to the one we have on the burn indicator that shows where the staging will occur.

 

Would help those of us who are calculator impaired in figuring how much more or less to take next time. Or when transferring fuel at a station.

 

Thanks,

 

ME
I don't think this would be helpful in spaceplane design due to differences in ascent profiles, but perhaps in the VAB? However I don't think it's really an issue there.
